data.name: Gunkid 99 Demo
data.detailed_description:
Gunkid 99 is a fast-paced, arena-shooter inspired by Super Crate Box and old-school arcade games. The goal of the game is to earn as high a score as you can by collecting weapon drops throughout a run (and thereby changing your weapon in the process).

There are multiple hand-crafted stages to choose from, all containing different layouts with their own set and combinations of enemies. Lay waste to endless hordes of enemies and compete for the High score with your Steam friends or on global leaderboards. Each stage has its own leaderboard, so develop your own unique play-style and strategies for each stage with the numerous weapons and abilities at your disposal!

Unlock a huge variety of weapons as you progress through the game.


Equip multiple abilities and develop your own unique play-style.



- there are lots more than just the ones shown here!

Features (work-in-progress) :

  • Tight and fluid movement. Double-jump, wall-kick and dodge-roll out of harm's way.
  • More than 30 unique weapons to choose from.
  • More than 40 special abilities. Mix and match them for the ultimate combo.
  • More than 20 hand-crafted stages, each with a different layout and enemies combination that requires different strategies to deal with.
  • Hone your skills and compare scores with others on global leaderboards!

data.short_description: GUNKID 99 is a fast-paced arena-shooter that is all about getting that HIGH SCORE. Customize your loadout and develop unique play-styles with numerous weapons and abilities at your disposal. Lay waste to endless hordes of enemies and get that high score on the Global Leaderboards!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
